hints.label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
hints.title: Kinetic Energy Control
hints.content:
388: :label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
389: 
390: The kinetic energy is controlled by the velocity Fisher information and KL divergence:
391: 
392: $$
393: E_v[\rho] \le E_v[\rho_\infty] + C_v D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{C_v'}{\gamma} I_v(\rho)
394: $$
hints.raw_directive:
385: **Lemma (Kinetic energy bound)**:
386: 
387: :::{prf:lemma} Kinetic Energy Control
388: :label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
389: 
390: The kinetic energy is controlled by the velocity Fisher information and KL divergence:
391: 
392: $$
393: E_v[\rho] \le E_v[\rho_\infty] + C_v D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{C_v'}{\gamma} I_v(\rho)
394: $$
